narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This 2nd pre-license for a Class "A" license and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant. 
Micro-chipping as a method of identification and a variance from the requirement to use the APHIS Form 7005 has
been approved. 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
The appropriate license fee must be sent to the following address: 
2150 Centre Ave. 
Building B, MS 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
